properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 9:39AM CST until January 12 at 9:45AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service has issued a Flood Warning for the
Loosahatchie River...S.F. of the Forked Deer River...Wolf River.

The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Wolf River at Germantown
* from Saturday January 11 until Sunday January 12.
* At 08 AM Saturday the stage was...7.5 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 21.5 feet on Sunday January 12.
* Flood stage is 20.5 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Saturday January 11 and
continue to rise to near 21.5 feet by Sunday January 12. The river
will fall below flood stage by Sunday January 12.
At 22.0 feet, Widespread lowland flooding is occurring. Greenways
along the Wolf River are flooded.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued Sunday or sooner if
conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
